info.title: odmObject Mode

mode.desc:
This odmObject describes the modes of operation that a Device can provide.
The mode can be read or set.
The Property "supportedModes" is an array of possible modes the device supports.
The Property "modes" is an array of the currently active mode(s).
mode.name: mode

Modes.desc: Array of the currently active mode(s)
Modes.name: Modes

supportedModes.desc: Array of possible modes the device supports.
supportedModes.name: supported modes
